timeline.message:
Create system threads properly

Create system threads in the system thread group, without inheriting any
thread locals, or retaining the current Thread context ClassLoader.

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Please remove the trailing whitespace here.
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText:
Please retain the call to super(); - at the very least it avoids the 'empty block' warning.
Alternatively, remove the constructor entirely.
timeline.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: Added back super();. Left the constructor since it's private, removing it would change that.
replies.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Actually, it would not be a change: an implicit default constructor has the same visibility as the class (private in this case).
replies.author: keithc-ca
